Name: Open Source Contributor Needed for OAuth2 Authentication & Authorization
Task:
We are looking for an experienced and passionate open-source contributor to assist with the development and enhancement of projects related to OAuth2 authentication and authorization. This role will primarily involve the following tasks:

Pull Request (PR) Reviews: Review incoming pull requests, ensuring adherence to coding standards, security best practices, and OAuth2-specific protocols.
Solution Suggestions: Provide suggestions for improving existing solutions related to OAuth2 implementations.

Feature Enhancements & Requests: Identify and propose new features or improvements that can be added to current projects in the OAuth2 space.

Collaboration: Work closely with other open-source contributors and maintainers to ensure that all contributions align with the overall project goals.

Requirements:
Strong experience with OAuth2 and authentication/authorization protocols.
Familiarity with open-source contribution workflows (e.g., pull requests, issue tracking, and community engagement).
Proficiency in common programming languages used in OAuth2 implementations (e.g., Python, JavaScript, Go, Java, etc.).
Experience with security best practices in authentication and authorization.
Ability to review code, suggest improvements, and contribute new feature ideas.
Previous experience with open-source projects or contribution to OAuth2-related repositories (preferred).

Preferred Skills:
Knowledge of industry-standard authentication protocols (e.g., OAuth2, OpenID Connect).
Experience with GitHub/GitLab/Bitbucket for version control and collaboration.
Strong communication skills to engage with a distributed team.

How to Apply:
Please provide examples of your previous work with OAuth2, any open-source contributions you have made, and a brief overview of your experience working on authentication and authorization projects.

Name: Freelancer Needed to Create Verified Contact Lists
Task:
We are seeking a skilled freelancer to create contact lists for businesses within specific niches and locations. The contact lists must include:
●	First Name
●	Last Name
●	Email Address
●	Business Name
All email addresses must be verified and tested for accuracy to ensure deliverability.
Responsibilities
●	Research and identify businesses in the given niche and location.
●	Collect and compile data for each contact, ensuring all required fields are complete.
●	Verify and test email addresses to ensure they are valid and functional.
●	Deliver a clean, accurate, and organized contact list in the specified format (e.g., Excel, Google Sheets).
Requirements
●	Proven experience in creating and verifying business contact lists.
●	Familiarity with tools for email verification and testing.
●	Strong attention to detail and data accuracy.
●	Ability to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality work.
Key Details
●	Fixed Price Quote: Please specify your rate for creating a list of [insert approximate number of contacts, e.g., 100 contacts].
●	Turnaround Time: Let us know how long it will take to deliver.
●	Start Date: Immediate
If you’re experienced in creating verified contact lists and can ensure quality and accuracy, we’d love to hear from you. Please reply with:
●	Your fixed price quote.
●	Estimated completion time.
●	A brief overview of your experience with similar tasks.

Name: Data Expert Needed for Aftermarket Parts Analysis
Task:
Objective:
We are looking for a data specialist who can help us estimate the ratio of product page views to sales. Our goal is to determine how many views a product listing receives before a sale occurs, which will help us better forecast conversions for new product launches.

Scope of Work:
Data Collection:

Scrape website product pages to obtain page view counts (if available). We have given the web listings below.
Extract available sales and/or review data for listed products.
Identify alternative data points if direct sales numbers are unavailable.

Data Analysis:
Use a known industry assumption (5% review-to-sales ratio) to estimate product sales where actual sales data isn’t available.
Calculate the average views-to-sales ratio for listed products.
Identify trends across product categories (motorcycle vs. UTV markets).
Websites & Products to Analyze:

Motorcycle and UTV aftermarket parts from sites including SlingMods, Rocky Mountain ATV/MC, SuperATV, Lamonster Garage, and Can-Am Spyder Accessories.
Full list of product links will be provided.

Deliverables:

A dataset or report outlining page views, estimated sales, and the derived views-to-sales ratio.
Insights on data limitations and alternative methods for estimating conversion rates if scraping is restricted.
Any additional observations that could refine our conversion forecasting model.

The links to the pages we'd like to use as our dataset:
https://www.slingmods.com/canam-spyder-sequential-front-fender-led-reflectors-spyderfenderz-tricled-2019-up
https://www.slingmods.com/polaris-slingshot-ultimat-mats?srsltid=AfmBOor7__wKCzbUHNzNOOw16TtT_hmtsIXUe_CsRi_kBOLurbMtxn8C
https://www.slingmods.com/polaris-slingshot-v-back-canvas-roof-top-bullet-speed?search=Bullet%20Speed%20Vented%20Hood%20Insert%20for%20the%20Polaris%20Slingshot
https://www.slingmods.com/canam-ryker-full-size-brake-pedal?search=Full%20Size%20Replacement%20Brake%20Pedal%20for%20the%20Can-Am%20Ryker
https://www.canamspyderaccessories.com/show-chrome-rt-2020-and-up-seat-shock/
https://www.canamspyderaccessories.com/show-chrome-rt-series-all-years-saddle-bags-soft-luggage-set-of-2/
https://www.lamonstergarage.com/show-chrome-short-spiral-antenna-can-am-spyder/
https://www.slingmods.com/polaris-slingshot-zero-g-roll-hoop-storage-bag-show-chrome?search=zero%20g
https://www.rockymountainatvmc.com/parts/tusk-brake-lever-p
https://www.rockymountainatvmc.com/parts/no-toil-pre-oiled-air-filter-p
https://kombustionmotorsports.com/products/3-4-point-harness-seat-belt-50-caliber-racing

Name: Scrape Website for Directory and Email Information
Task:
Description:
I am looking for a freelancer to extract college counselor contact information from the website
https://www.schooldirectory.org/

Project Requirements:
Extract the college counseling contact information for every school in the database.  [Note: If you go onto the website and visit the page for a given high school in the directory, and then scroll down, you come a section called: "Academics" which has "College Counselor Info." I want to grab all that college counselor info!]

Format the data in an Excel sheet with the following columns:
First Name
Middle Name
Last Name
Email
Job Title
Any other relevant fields available in the directory

****Ensure first, middle and last names are in separate columns for easy mail merge processing.*****

Deliver the data in Excel and CSV format

Skills Required:
Web scraping and automation (Python, BeautifulSoup, Scrapy, etc.)
Data extraction and formatting
Experience with mail merge formatting in Google Sheets or Excel
Attention to detail to ensure data accuracy
Preferred Qualifications:
Prior experience scraping membership directories
Ability to automate the process for future updates
Familiarity with ethical scraping practices (ensuring compliance with NACAC's terms of service)

Budget & Timeline:
Budget: Open to proposals; expecting about $80 depending on complexity.
Timeline: Preferably within 3 days.

Application Requirements:
In your proposal, please include:
Your approach to extracting the data (automated scraping, manual entry, etc.).
Estimated time for completion.
Examples of similar projects you've worked on.
Looking forward to working with a detail-oriented freelancer who can deliver clean, organized data for my email campaign

Name: Web Data Extraction & Reverse Engineering Specialist
Task: I’m looking for a skilled developer to reverse engineer specific data from a few websites. The ideal candidate will have experience with web scraping, data extraction, and understanding site structures to retrieve relevant information efficiently. Familiarity with JavaScript, Python, and browser automation tools (e.g., Selenium, Puppeteer) is a plus. This is a short-term project with potential for ongoing work based on results.

Name: Virtual Assistant for Outbound Email Prospecting and Lead Generation
Task:
About Us:
Unalome Yoga, a growing yoga brand specializing in premium yoga products, is seeking a detail-oriented and motivated Virtual Assistant to help us with outbound email prospecting and lead generation. 

What You’ll Be Doing:
 - Research and compile a list of hot yoga studios in the U.S. 
 - Send outreach emails to yoga studio owners/managers using provided templates, to identify potential wholesale partnership opportunities.
 - Track responses and follow up with leads using a CRM, Apollo or spreadsheet
 - Provide weekly updates on progress and results.

Key Responsibilities:
 - Strong written communication skills in English.
 - Excellent research skills to identify yoga studios, and then dig deeper for primary emails for General Managers, Owners, Directors, Studio Managers, etc. 
 - Detail-oriented with excellent organizational skills.
 - Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
 - Familiarity with Google Sheets or Excel for tracking data

Bonus Skills (Not Required):
 - Interest in yoga, fitness, or wellness.
 - Experience working with e-commerce or product-based businesses.
 - Experience with email outreach or lead generation tools (e.g. Apollo.io)

Compensation:
 - Hourly Rate: $3–$8/hour, depending on experience
 - Hours/Week: 5 - 10
Skills_Expertise: Data ScrapingData EntryLead GenerationEmail CommunicationProspect ListLead NurturingEmail MarketingList BuildingEmail Campaign Setup
